placeholder.desc: Text to display on server-side render (unless using 'placeholder' slot)
placeholder.desc_cn: 要在服务器端渲染上显示的文本（除非使用“placeholder”槽）

default.desc: Default slot is used to render content on client-side
default.desc_cn: 默认槽用于在客户端呈现内容

placeholder.desc: Slot used as placeholder on server-side render, which gets replaced by the default slot on client-side; overrides 'placeholder' prop
placeholder.desc_cn: 在服务器端渲染中用作占位符的插槽，将被客户端的默认插槽替换；覆盖“placeholder”属性
